awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: This historical drama is an account of the early life of British politician Winston Churchill (Simon Ward), including his childhood years, his time as a war correspondent in Africa, and culminating with his first election to Parliament.

title: Young Winston
writers: Winston Churchill (based upon "My Early Life: A Roving Commission")
